languages.text: "Подрыв логистических линий, подкуп служителей Адептус Администратум, подделка документов, а также организация еретических бунтов. Кроме очевидно ужасающих экономических последствий для вашего протектората, все это привело к нарушениям поставок Имперской десятины, что в свою очередь привлекло внимание Администратума. Разумеется, достопочтимые Адептус Арбитес не оставят это без внимания, и до их прибытия нам необходимо разрешить ситуацию, наказав виновных".

traits.locale_text: "Подрыв логистических линий, подкуп служителей Адептус Администратум, подделка документов, а также организация еретических бунтов. Кроме очевидно ужасающих экономических последствий для вашего протектората, все это привело к нарушениям поставок Имперской десятины, что в свою очередь привлекло внимание Администратума. Разумеется, достопочтимые Адептус Арбитес не оставят это без внимания, и до их прибытия нам необходимо разрешить ситуацию, наказав виновных".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. Needless to say, the esteemed Adeptus Arbites cannot ignore this situation either, and before their representatives arrive at the palace, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

"Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. Needless to say, the esteemed Adeptus Arbites cannot ignore this situation either, and before their representatives arrive at the palace, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

languages.text: « Perturbation des lignes logistiques, corruption d'agents de l'Adeptus Administratum, falsification de documents, organisation d'insurrections hérétiques... Sans même parler de l'impact économique que tous ces crimes ont eu sur votre protectorat, qui est déjà dramatique, ils ont surtout entravé la collecte de la dîme impériale, ce qui a attiré l'attention de l'Administratum. Inutile de vous dire que l'honorable Adeptus Arbites ne saurait fermer les yeux sur cette situation. Il est crucial que nous identifiions et châtiions les coupables avant l'arrivée de ses représentants au palais. »
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. Needless to say, the esteemed Adeptus Arbites cannot ignore this situation either, and before their representatives arrive at the palace, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: « Perturbation des lignes logistiques, corruption d'agents de l'Adeptus Administratum, falsification de documents, organisation d'insurrections hérétiques... Sans même parler de l'impact économique que tous ces crimes ont eu sur votre protectorat, qui est déjà dramatique, ils ont surtout entravé la collecte de la dîme impériale, ce qui a attiré l'attention de l'Administratum. Inutile de vous dire que l'honorable Adeptus Arbites ne saurait fermer les yeux sur cette situation. Il est crucial que nous identifiions et châtiions les coupables avant l'arrivée de ses représentants au palais. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Störung logistischer Routen, Bestechung von Vertretern des Adeptus Administratum, Fälschung von Dokumenten und Organisation ketzerischer Aufstände. Neben ihren nachweislich verheerenden ökonomischen Auswirkungen auf Euer Protektorat haben diese Verbrechen die Erhebung des Imperialen Zehnts behindert, was wiederum die Aufmerksamkeit des Administratums geweckt hat. Natürlich können auch die geschätzten Adeptus Arbites diese Situation nicht ignorieren, und wir müssen die Verantwortlichen identifizieren und bestrafen, bevor ihre Vertreter im Palast eintreffen."
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. Needless to say, the esteemed Adeptus Arbites cannot ignore this situation either, and before their representatives arrive at the palace, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: "Störung logistischer Routen, Bestechung von Vertretern des Adeptus Administratum, Fälschung von Dokumenten und Organisation ketzerischer Aufstände. Neben ihren nachweislich verheerenden ökonomischen Auswirkungen auf Euer Protektorat haben diese Verbrechen die Erhebung des Imperialen Zehnts behindert, was wiederum die Aufmerksamkeit des Administratums geweckt hat. Natürlich können auch die geschätzten Adeptus Arbites diese Situation nicht ignorieren, und wir müssen die Verantwortlichen identifizieren und bestrafen, bevor ihre Vertreter im Palast eintreffen."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “扰乱后勤路线、贿赂帝国内政部长官、伪造文件、组织异端叛乱。这些犯罪行为不仅对您的王朝经济造成了破坏性的后果，还对帝国什一税的缴纳工作造成了阻碍，而这已经引起了内政部的注意。毫无疑问，尊敬的法务部成员也绝不会对此置之不理。我们有义务在法务部的人抵达宫殿之前，将相关的责任人揪出来，进行惩处。”
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. Needless to say, the esteemed Adeptus Arbites cannot ignore this situation either, and before their representatives arrive at the palace, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: “扰乱后勤路线、贿赂帝国内政部长官、伪造文件、组织异端叛乱。这些犯罪行为不仅对您的王朝经济造成了破坏性的后果，还对帝国什一税的缴纳工作造成了阻碍，而这已经引起了内政部的注意。毫无疑问，尊敬的法务部成员也绝不会对此置之不理。我们有义务在法务部的人抵达宫殿之前，将相关的责任人揪出来，进行惩处。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: “扰乱后勤路线、贿赂帝国内政部长官、伪造文件、组织异端叛乱。这些犯罪行为不仅对您的王朝经济造成了破坏性的后果，还对帝国什一税的缴纳工作造成了阻碍，而这已经引起了内政部的注意。德高望重的法务部成员恐怕很快就会抵达这里。我们有义务在法务部的人到来之前，将相关的责任人揪出来，进行惩处。”

languages.text: «Disrupción de las cadenas logísticas, soborno de funcionarios del Adeptus Administratum, falsificación de documentos y organización de insurrecciones heréticas. Además del devastador efecto sobre su protectorado, estos actos criminales han afectado a la colecta del Diezmo Imperial, lo que a su vez ha atraído la atención del Administratum. Lógicamente, el Adeptus Arbites tampoco puede ignorar la situación, y es nuestro deber encontrar y castigar a los responsables antes de que sus representantes lleguen a palacio».
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. Needless to say, the esteemed Adeptus Arbites cannot ignore this situation either, and before their representatives arrive at the palace, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: «Disrupción de las cadenas logísticas, soborno de funcionarios del Adeptus Administratum, falsificación de documentos y organización de insurrecciones heréticas. Además del devastador efecto sobre su protectorado, estos actos criminales han afectado a la colecta del Diezmo Imperial, lo que a su vez ha atraído la atención del Administratum. Lógicamente, el Adeptus Arbites tampoco puede ignorar la situación, y es nuestro deber encontrar y castigar a los responsables antes de que sus representantes lleguen a palacio».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「補給路の妨害、帝国行政局の職員への贈賄、文書の偽造、そして異端による反乱の扇動。これらの犯罪行為が、あなたの保護領に深刻な経済的打撃を与えたのは明白です。さらには帝国の租税納付にも支障をきたし、帝国行政局の注意を引くこととなりました。言うまでもなく、高名なる高等裁定局もこの状況を看過することはできません。代表の方々が宮殿に到着する前に、責任者を特定し、処罰しなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. Needless to say, the esteemed Adeptus Arbites cannot ignore this situation either, and before their representatives arrive at the palace, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: 「補給路の妨害、帝国行政局の職員への贈賄、文書の偽造、そして異端による反乱の扇動。これらの犯罪行為が、あなたの保護領に深刻な経済的打撃を与えたのは明白です。さらには帝国の租税納付にも支障をきたし、帝国行政局の注意を引くこととなりました。言うまでもなく、高名なる高等裁定局もこの状況を看過することはできません。代表の方々が宮殿に到着する前に、責任者を特定し、処罰しなければなりません」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: 「物流網の寸断、帝国行政局への贈収賄、文書偽造、異端反乱の組織化。このような犯罪行為により貴国の保護領に壊滅的な経済的打撃を与えるのみならず、帝国の租税納付にも支障をきたし、行政府に注視されるに至る。高等裁定局の成員が間もなく到着される予定であり、その前に責任者を特定し処罰せねばならない」

languages.text: "Lojistik hatlarını aksatmak, Adeptus Administratum mensuplarına rüşvet vermek, din karşıtı isyanlar tertip etmek ve evrakta sahtecilik. Bu durum, protektoranızda yaşanan ekonomik felakete ek olarak İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın tahsilatına da sekte vurmuş ve Administratum'un dikkatini çekmiştir. Saygın Adeptus Arbites bu durumu görmezden gelemez, temsilcileri çok yakında sarayda olacaktır. Bu mühlette bahsi geçen suçların müsebbiplerini bulmak ve cezalandırmakla mükellefiz."
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. Needless to say, the esteemed Adeptus Arbites cannot ignore this situation either, and before their representatives arrive at the palace, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: "Lojistik hatlarını aksatmak, Adeptus Administratum mensuplarına rüşvet vermek, din karşıtı isyanlar tertip etmek ve evrakta sahtecilik. Bu durum, protektoranızda yaşanan ekonomik felakete ek olarak İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın tahsilatına da sekte vurmuş ve Administratum'un dikkatini çekmiştir. Saygın Adeptus Arbites bu durumu görmezden gelemez, temsilcileri çok yakında sarayda olacaktır. Bu mühlette bahsi geçen suçların müsebbiplerini bulmak ve cezalandırmakla mükellefiz."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Lojistik hatlarını aksatmak, Adeptus Administratum mensuplarına rüşvet vermek, din karşıtı isyanlar tertip etmek ve evrakta sahtecilik. Bu durum, protektoranızda yaşanan ekonomik felakete ek olarak İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın tahsilatına da sekte vurmuş ve Administratum'un dikkatini çekmiştir. Adeptus Arbites'in saygın bir mensubu, çok yakında Dargonus'a gelecek. Bu mühlette bahsi geçen suçların müsebbiplerini bulmak ve cezalandırmakla mükellefiz."
